price: 50. Amarkayaguna ma aha waxaan ahayn sida ilbiriqsi.
arabic: وَمَآ أَمۡرُنَآ إِلَّا وَٰحِدَةٞ كَلَمۡحِۭ بِٱلۡبَصَرِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā amrunā illā wāḥidatun kalamḥin bil-baṣari
